home.name: Laís Sanseverino
home.intro: Hello! My name is Laís Sanseverino - designer and biologist, fascinated by the relationships between health, education, and informational design.

ProfileInfo.vision: My vision is marked by interdisciplinarity and driven by continuous learning, as evident in my various degrees and work experiences.
ProfileInfo.informationToVisual: I say I enjoy taking information – redundant, verbose, and difficult – and transforming it into concise visual communication that pleases the target audience, always based on information and user-centered design.
ProfileInfo.work: In addition to freelancing, I work as an Instructional Designer at the Distance Education Department at the State University of Londrina, and I was the Clinical Research Coordinator at the São Francisco Medical Center.
ProfileInfo.leisure: In my leisure time, I enjoy going to the gym and expressing myself artistically through fashion, crafts, and illustration.

CurriculumSection.materialCreation: Planning and creation of educational materials
CurriculumSection.guides: Guides, manuals, and static and interactive infographics
